personal.shortBio: I am a passionate mathematics student with strong interests in pure and applied mathematics, problem solving, and computational modeling.
personal.longBio: I am a final-year mathematics student deeply fascinated by the elegance of mathematical structures and their applications in real-world problems. My academic journey has focused on analysis, linear algebra, probability, and mathematical modeling. I enjoy transforming abstract theory into practical insight through research and computation. Beyond coursework, I actively participate in math competitions, academic seminars, and independent research projects.
personal.philosophy: Mathematics is not just calculation; it is the language of logical beauty.
personal.quote: Pure mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas. — Albert Einstein
